item.title: 自动部署hugo脚本
item.description: 写完markdowm再输入手动命令行进行部署hugo太费事了，于是就写了这个脚本： #!/bin/sh input = "" function list(){ echo "查询到有以下md文件:" cd content/post/ ls cd ../../ } function add(){ echo "请输入文章的题目：" read input hugo new post/$input.md vim content/post/$input.md hugo cd public git add . git commit -m "add $input" git push origin master echo "" echo "Add $input done!" } function deploy(){ hugo cd public git add . git commit -m "add $input" git push origin master echo "" echo "Deploy done!" } function change(){ list echo "请输入要修改的文章题目：" read input vim content/post/$input.
